alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 2:56PM AKDT until March 31 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 6 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong east winds will develop Thursday morning and continue into Thursday night. These strong winds are expected to cause blowing snow with low visibility.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
